q: ( AFP)- British Prime Minister David Cameron has been damaged by his media chief's resignation over phone-hacking at a tabloid newspaper he headed and the row is unlikely to go away, commentators said Saturday. So far, our worst day in government, a senior aide from David Cameron 's Downing Street office told The Guardian, after Andy Coulson quit as chief of communications on Friday. "Not only are they great to look at, Jennifer Lopez and Steven Tyler are long-time stars who have nothing to gain, or lose, by being part of American Idol.
